nodes.text: Prytis was the northern continent on the planet Bakura, known for massive forests and Bakuran nobles' estates. Most Bakurans lived on Prytis and the capital city of Salis D'aar was located on the continent as well. Prytis possessed an abundance of arable land and extensive agricultural regions, including many namana plantations in the southernmost regions. Prytis' northern mountain ranges were riddled with mines and quarries.
